title: [Coliseum, Northwest Corridor]
description: Polished stone walls reflect the light of a trio of vaalin-banded torches that has been inset into ornate brackets.  Centered over a brick-lined tunnel is a deep crimson banner that reads "Arena Entrance" embroidered in thick golden thread.  A golden banner over a crimson arch reads "Viewing Chamber" in elegant crimson embroidery.
